title: How to Catch Shaymin on Pok√©mon Diamond or Pearl

steps.title: Find an exit tunnel that leaves to the right.
steps.content: Find an exit tunnel that leaves to the right.

steps.title: Follow the path until you get to Shaymin.
steps.content: Follow the path until you get to Shaymin. It is very weak, so go easy. [2] X Research source Use "Walk Through Walls Cheat" to go to the silver rock by Victory Road.

steps.title: Go forward a bit, once you see the first Shaymin, it's just a mirage so use your bike and keep going forward through the flowers until you see Shaymin.
steps.content: Go forward a bit, once you see the first Shaymin, it's just a mirage so use your bike and keep going forward through the flowers until you see Shaymin. An easy way to catch Shaymin is using the 100% catch code on your Action Replay. The code is: 9223c1f4 00002801 1223c1f4 00004280 d2000000 00000000

steps.title: Near the exit, there should be an entrance where a man was blocking it.
steps.content: Near the exit, there should be an entrance where a man was blocking it. Go through there, and you should meet a Trainer who will help you fight through the tunnel.

steps.title: When you reach the exit, explore until you get to the Silver stone.
steps.content: When you reach the exit, explore until you get to the Silver stone.

steps.title: Press A to talk to it.
steps.content: Press A to talk to it. Afterwards, Prof. Oak will come and will ask you what you would like to give thanks for. Enter a phrase then confirm.

steps.title: The stone should transport you to where Shaymin is.
steps.content: The stone should transport you to where Shaymin is.

steps.title: There will be a long, ongoing road.
steps.content: There will be a long, ongoing road. Use your bicycle to quickly navigate to the end.

steps.title: Shaymin should be there.
steps.content: Shaymin should be there. Press A to talk to it and a battle will start. Shaymin will be at Level.30.
